  • Hide and show attributes

Hide and show attributes

Sometimes there are just too many attributes. It would be great to get most of them out of the way.

Here is the plan:

  • Launch Choosy from the Plugins menu.
  • Click the Attributes tab.
  • Use the green and gray slidey buttons on the left to hide and show the attributes you want.

As you do that, watch how the table hides and shows the attributes.

Notes

When you hide an attribute, you’re only hiding it. It’s still there with all of its data.

Also, when you’re done adjusting your attributes, go ahead and close choosy. You can always open it again by picking it from the Plugins menu. And it will remember which attributes are currently hidden.

Finally, if you click on the blue “info” circles, Choosy will show you the comments about the attribute.

Try out Choosy in the live dem below:
